          @Override      public Collection<ConfigAttribute> getAttributes(Object object) throws IllegalArgumentException {          AntPathRequestMatcher matcher;          String resUrl;          HttpServletRequest request = ((FilterInvocation) object).getRequest();                    if (configAttubuteMap == null) {              loadResourceDefine();          }          Iterator<String> iterator = configAttubuteMap.keySet().iterator();          while (iterator.hasNext()) {              resUrl = iterator.next();              matcher = new AntPathRequestMatcher(resUrl);              if (matcher.matches(request)) {                  return configAttubuteMap.get(resUrl);              }          }          return null;          }
